title: Mojave National Preserve: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       Looking for more information? Explore the other pages in this section to learn more.   Park News Look here for news releases and a downloadable version of the park news and guide.   Photos & Multimedia Browse our collection of photos, take a virtual tour, or download useful apps and podcasts.    History & Culture People have called this place home for thousands of years. Read their stories and learn how we're working to protect these special places.    Nature Three of the four major North American Deserts come together at Mojave National Preserve, supporting a surprising diversity of plants and wildlife. A rich geologic history and a wide range of elevations throughout the park make for unique landscapes.    Science & Research Apply for a research permit, browse scientific publications, review research needs, read about ongoing projects, and more.    Education Mojave offers a variety of free education programs for school groups. Let us help you plan a day or overnight field trip, or invite a ranger to visit your classroom.   Kids & Youth Learn about the many kid-friendly activities in the park and find out how to become a Junior Ranger.    Management Find planning documents, review park laws and policies, and learn about fire management in the park.    Bookstore Looking for more about Mojave? Western National Parks Association operates bookstores at our three visitor centers and online.
